methods.name: public Builder setExtras(@NonNull Bundle extras)
methods.comment:
* Sets extra options associated with this context. * *

It can be used to provide vendor-specific data that can be modified and examined. * * @param extras extra options. * @return this builder. * * @throws IllegalStateException if {@link #build()} was already called.

methods.name: public ContentCaptureContext build()
methods.comment:
* Builds the {@link ContentCaptureContext}.
         *
         * @throws IllegalStateException if {@link #build()} was already called.
         *
         * @return the built {@code ContentCaptureContext}
